name: Blood-Let
description:
Force a target creature to make a constitution saving throw. On a failure, they take 3 minor bleed, and on a success the creature takes no bleed.
The bleed type this spell inflicts improves dependant on the caster’s level. At 5th level inflict 3 moderate bleed, at 11th inflict 3 major bleed, and at 17th inflict 3 catastrophic bleed.
